basics.summary: Starting with a passion for blockchain and decentralized systems, I honed my skills in Web3 technologies through hands-on projects and hackathons. Balancing my studies with this side hustle, I’m funding my college education while offering expertise in both classical and decentralized development. Sincerely dedicated to technology, I bring a unique blend of skills and a collaborative spirit to every project.
